name: 2022 2nd International Workshop on Frontiers of Graphics and Image Processing
content: Paper Publication: Accepted papers of FGIP 2022 will be published in Conference Proceedings by SPIE, which will be included in SPIE Digital Library and indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus, and CPCI (Web of Science), or Journal of Image and Graphics (JOIG, ISSN: 2301-3699), indexed by Scopus, Google Scholar, Crossref, etc.
topics: computer graphics, animation, virtual reality & gaming
